snippet.title: Mana Monsters: New Update! 🏝️
snippet.description:
Hey Wranglers, Its update time again! Here is what you can expect to see this time around...

New Monster Hatches ► Be sure to check out the all-new Monster Hatch Portal!
PvP Revamp ► Smaller teams, with improved opponent selection!
New Monster ► the new fire monster Skelemandar, will be obtainable from the Summon Event!

Epic monsters and action await you in this free, fun, tactical match 3 game!

Mana Monsters is a completely new take on match 3 puzzle games! Combining RPG elements, immersive story, world exploration, and monster collection - topped with epic PvP battles.

Start your fantasy adventure today!

Download on googleplay! ►► https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.artrix.manamonsters

★ UNIQUE PUZZLE RPG

Lead your monsters to victory by matching colorful gems and creating epic combos!

★ COLLECT EPIC MONSTERS

Hatch Monster eggs or summon hordes of mighty Legendary and Mythical Monsters!

★ UPGRADE POWERFUL MONSTERS

Level Up, Upgrade, and Merge monsters together and unlock their special powers!

★ ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM

Create the perfect Monster team with different classes, types, and elements!

★ EPIC BOSS BATTLES

Defeat corrupted Boss Monsters and villainous characters to rescue the Underlands!

★ PVP BATTLES

Compete in intense match-3 battles in the Arena as you fight for your place on the leaderboards!

★ BUILD YOUR CAMP

Grow and manage your camp for resources to help you on your Hero’s journey!

★ IMMERSIVE STORY

Explore a new world with an engaging story full of mystery and intrigue!

Be the HERO of the story in this QUEST to COLLECT all the LEGENDARY Mana Monsters! Join players from around the WORLD in this epic puzzle RPG adventure! Master colorful match-3 battles.

Do you have what it takes to hatch tons of cute monsters and beat the bad guys as you uncover the hidden secrets of the mysterious Underland?

Download today and start your adventure! 

Mana Monsters is completely free to download and play, some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device settings.

Help & Support Email: mm-support@outerdawn.com
Terms and Conditions: https://www.outerdawn.com/termsconditions/en
Privacy Policy: https://www.outerdawn.com/privacypolicy/en
Facebook: facebook.com/ManaMonstersGame
Twitter: Mana_Monsters
Instagram: ManaMonstersGame

Subscribe for more! ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNsq--Vp5_poEhVXG68A-oQ?view_as=subscriber

#manamonsters #mobilegames #outerdawn
